text: Brown of Harvard is a 1926 American sports drama movie directed by Jack Conway and based on the play of the same name by Ride Johnson Young. It stars Jack Pickford, William Haines, Mary Brian, Francis X. Bushman Jr., Edward Connelly, John Wayne and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Conway
title: Brown of Harvard (1926 movie)
